title: Out of memory error
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.4.9-stable`
OS & Version: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
Memory: 4GB
Cache: 128MB cache for chaindata, 16MB cache for dapp
Type: private chain
#### Expected behaviour

Synchronization blocks and handle requests from JSON RPC as well as Web3
#### Actual behaviour

Out of memory error
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Keep running geth for a few days

Please update to [Geth 1.4.13](https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/releases/tag/v1.4.13). There are a series of ongoing attacks against Geth nods for about a week now. Those are causing OOM issues.

Well, we are working on a project under the private chain. These attacks should not affect our chain. Actually we found that we had unlocked too many accounts at the same time. So that OOM issues happened.
Any way, thank you for your help!
